original_text: And he said to me, “O Daniel, man greatly loved, understand the words that I speak to you, and stand upright, for now I have been sent to you.” And when he had spoken this word to me, I stood up trembling.
korean_text: 내게 이르되 큰 은총을 받은 사람 다니엘아 내가 네게 이르는 말을 깨닫고 일어서라 내가 네게 보내심을 받았느니라 하더라 그가 내게 이 말을 한 후에 내가 떨며 일어서니

sentences.original_text: understand the words that I speak to you,
for now I have been sent to you.”
And when he had spoken this word to me,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 이 말씀을 내게 하고 나서,
